definition: To defeat someone in a game, competition, election, or battle
example in english: England needed to beat Germany to get to the final.
translation into uzbek: Angliya finalga chiqish uchun Germaniyani mag'lub etishi kerak edi.

definition: Any game in which you move objects around on a special board
example in english: I think that Trivial Pursuit is my favourite board game.
translation into uzbek: Menimcha, Trivial Pursuit mening eng sevimli stol o'yinim.

definition: The person who is in charge of a team or organisation
example in english: She was captain of the Olympic swimming team.
translation into uzbek: U Olimpiada suzish guruhining sardori edi.

definition: To invite someone to compete or fight
example in english: The girls challenged the boys to a cricket match.
translation into uzbek: Qizlar yigitlarni krikket o'ynashga da'vat etishdi.

Uzbek Translation: musobaqaga yoki urushga chorlamoq, da'vat etmoq
definition: Something that needs a lot of skill, energy, and determination to deal with or achieve
example in english: I felt I needed a new challenge at work.
translation into uzbek: Men ish joyimda o'zim uchun yangi sinov kerakligini his qildim.

definition: Someone who has won an important competition, especially in sport
example in english: He finally became the world heavyweight boxing champion.
translation into uzbek: U vanixoyat og'ir vazn toifasida dunyo chempioni bo'ldi.

definition: To behave dishonestly, or to not obey rules
example in english: Kids have always found ways of cheating in school exams.
translation into uzbek: Bolalar har doim maktab imtihonlarida aldash usullarini topganlar.

definition: Serious music that is played on instruments such as the piano and the violin
example in english: I love classical music, like Beethoven.
translation into uzbek: Menga mumtoz musiqa yoqadi, masalan Bethoven.

definition: An organisation for people who take part in a particular activity, or the building that they use
example in english: Why don't you join a chess club?
translation into uzbek: Nega shaxmat klubiga qo'shilmaysiz?

definition: Someone who trains a sports player or team
example in english: After playing for ten years, Barry became a baseball coach.
translation into uzbek: 10 yil (beysbol) o'ynagandan keyin, Barri beysbol murabbiyi bo'ldi.

definition: An organised event in which people try to win prizes by being better than other people
example in english: He'd entered a competition in the local newspaper.
translation into uzbek: U mahalliy nashriyotdagi musobaqaga qo'shildi.

definition: An event at which an orchestra, band, or musician plays or sings in front of an audience
example in english: Did you hear that the Rolling Stones did a concert in China?
translation into uzbek: Rolling Stones guruhi Xitoyda konsert berganini eshitdingizmi?

example in english: France defeated Italy 3-1.
translation into uzbek: Fransiya Italiyani 3-1 hisobda mag'lubiyatga uchratdi.

definition: Failure to win a competition or to succeed in doing something
example in english: England suffered a 2-0 defeat.
translation into uzbek: Angliya 2-0 hisobida mag'lub bo'ldi

example in english: I saw a really entertaining programme on TV last night.
translation into uzbek: Men kecha tunda televizorda juda qiziqarli bir dastur ko'rdim.

definition: Traditional music from a particular country or region, or music played in a traditional style
example in english: What I like about folk music is the sound of the guitar.
translation into uzbek: Milliy musiqaning menga yoqadigan jihati bu gitara sadosi.

definition: A room or club with equipment for doing physical exercises
example in english: My brother has got his own group and they play in our local area.
translation into uzbek: Akam o'z guruhiga ega va ular bizning mahalliy hududda ijro etishadi.

definition: A room or club with equipment for doing physical exercises
example in english: I'm thinking of joining a gym.
translation into uzbek: Men sport zaliga qo'shilish haqida o'ylayapman.

definition: Get enjoyment from an activity that is not important or serious
example in english: We haven't had such fun for years.
translation into uzbek: Ancha yildan beri, bunchalik xursandchilik qilmagandik.

definition: To make someone want to know about or take part in something
example in english: Photography has always interested me.
translation into uzbek: Fotograflik meni doim qiziqtirib kelgan.

definition: An activity that you enjoy doing when you are not working
example in english: Tell us about your interests and hobbies.
translation into uzbek: Qiziqishlaringiz va sevimli mashg'ulotlaringiz haqida bizga aytib bering.

definition: Someone who belongs to a group or an organisation
example in english: Are you a member of the golf club?
translation into uzbek: Siz golf klubi a'zosimisiz?

definition: Someone who is competing against you
example in english: His opponent received only 36 percent of the vote.
translation into uzbek: Uning raqibi ovozlarning bor yo'g'i 36 foizini oldi.

definition: To prepare or arrange an activity or event
example in english: Who's organising the conference?
translation into uzbek: Konferensiyani kim tashkillashtiryapti?

definition: A feeling of happiness, enjoyment, or satisfaction
example in english: Rick smiled with pleasure when Michonne walked in.
translation into uzbek: Mishon kirib kelganida, Rik mamnuniyat bilan jilmaydi.

definition: Someone whose job is to make sure that players in a game obey the rules
example in english: The referee blew his whistle and the game began.
translation into uzbek: Hakam hushtagini chaldi va o'yin boshlandi.

definition: A regular pattern of sounds in music
example in english: This song has got a really great rhythm.
translation into uzbek: Bu qo'shiq judayam ajoyib ritmga ega.

definition: To do something although you know that something bad could happen as a result
example in english: He risked a lot of money on the company.
translation into uzbek: U kompaniya uchun katta pul tikdi

definition: The possibility that something unpleasant or dangerous might happen
example in english: There's a serious risk of an accident on the road.
translation into uzbek: Ushbu mashina yo'lida jiddiy avariya bo'lish xavfi mavjud.

definition: To get a point in a game or sport
example in english: No one scored in the first half.
translation into uzbek: O'yinning birinchi yarmida hech kim go'l urmadi.

definition: The number of points that someone gains in a game or test
example in english: The final score was 4-3 to United.
translation into uzbek: Yakuniy hisob Yunayted foydasiga 4-3 bo'ldi.

definition: To like a particular sports team and always want them to win
example in english: I support West Ham—who do you support?
translation into uzbek: Men Vest Hem jamoasini qo'llab-quvvatlayman–siz kimni qo'llab-quvvatlaysiz?

definition: Help that you give to a particular idea, organisation, etc
example in english: Her family and friends have given her lots of support.
translation into uzbek: Uning oilasi va do'stlari unga juda ko'p madad berishgan.

definition: A group of people who play a sport or game against another group
example in english: Are you in the hockey team this year?
translation into uzbek: Siz bu yil hokkey guruhidamisiz?

definition: To practise a sport regularly before a match or competition
example in english: The players train five days a week.
translation into uzbek: O'yinchilar haftada 5 kun shug'ullanishadi.

definition: A game in which players use electronic controls to move images on a television or computer screen
example in english: I don't like video games—I'd rather play outside.
translation into uzbek: Menga video o'yinlar yoqmaydi–ko'chada o'ynashni afzal ko'raman.

definition: To succeed in doing or having something
example in english: We've achieved what we wanted to do.
translation into uzbek: Qilishni xohlagan narsamizga erishdik.

definition: The organ inside your head that allows you to think and feel, and controls your body
example in english: The illness had affected his brain.
translation into uzbek: Kasallik uning miyasiga ta'sir qilgan edi.

definition: Good at learning or understanding things
example in english: I'd like to be a doctor, but I'm not clever enough.
translation into uzbek: Men shifokor bo'lishni istardim, ammo yetarlicha aqlli emasman.

definition: To give all your attention to the thing that you are doing
example in english: Just concentrate on your work.
translation into uzbek: Shunchaki fikringizni ishga qarating.

definition: To think about something carefully before you make a decision
example in english: At one time I seriously considered leaving.
translation into uzbek: Bir vaqtlar men ketishni jiddiy o'ylab ko'rganman.

definition: A series of lessons in an academic subject or a practical skill
example in english: You could do a language course abroad.
translation into uzbek: Siz chet elda til kursini o'tashingiz mumkin.

definition: A course of study at a university, or the qualification that you get after completing the course
example in english: She's doing a degree at Exeter University.
translation into uzbek: U Exeter Universitetida (ma'lum bir yo'nalishda) tahsil oladi.

definition: If you experience a problem or situation, you have that problem or are in that situation
example in english: I'd love to experience being in a submarine.
translation into uzbek: Men suv osti kemasida bo'lib ko'rishni istardim.

definition: Knowledge and skill that you get by doing a particular job or activity
example in english: Do you have any previous experience with children?
translation into uzbek: Sizda bolalar bilan ishlash bo'yicha tajriba bormi?

definition: Someone who has a particular skill or knows a lot about a particular subject
example in english: She's a computer expert.
translation into uzbek: U kompyuter mutaxassisi.

definition: Having special skills in or knowledge about something
example in english: He's an expert painter.
translation into uzbek: U usta rassom.

example in english: He failed the maths exam.
translation into uzbek: U matematika imtihonidan yiqildi.

definition: To say or decide what you think is true, without being certain about it
example in english: Whoever guesses correctly will win two tickets to the show.
translation into uzbek: Kimda-kim to'g'ri taxmin qilsa, shouga 2 ta chipta yutib oladi.

definition: An occasion when you say what you think is true without being certain
example in english: Have a guess and then check it on your calculator.
translation into uzbek: Taxmin qilib ko'ring va so'ng kalkulyatoringizda tekshirib ko'ring.

definition: To pause before doing something because you are nervous or not certain about it
example in english: He hesitated for a moment and then knocked on the door.
translation into uzbek: U biroz muddat ikkilandi va so'ng eshikni taqillatdi.

definition: A statement of something that must be done, or an explanation of how to do or use something
example in english: I tried to follow her instructions, but I got confused.
translation into uzbek: Uning ko'rsatmalariga amal qilishga harakat qildim, lekin dovdirab qoldim (chalkashib ketdim).

example in english: My guitar teacher says I'm making a lot of progress.
translation into uzbek: Gitara o'qituvchimning aytishicha, men juda ham yaxshilanyapman.

definition: To check something, so that you can be sure about it
example in english: I just wanted to make sure you knew where to go.
translation into uzbek: Men shunchaki qayerga borish kerakligini bilishingizga ishonch hosil qilishni xohlagandim.

definition: To judge the quality of a student's work and write a mark on it
example in english: I spent the evening marking essays.
translation into uzbek: Men oqshomni insholarni baholab o'tkazdim.

definition: A score or grade that you are given for school work or for how you perform in a competition
example in english: What mark did you get for your essay?
translation into uzbek: Inshoyingiz uchun necha baho oldingiz?

definition: Existing in the mind, or relating to the mind
example in english: Scientists know a lot about the mental development of children.
translation into uzbek: Olimlar bolalarning aqliy rivojlanishi to'g'risida ko'p narsalarni bilishadi.

definition: To be successful in an examination or test
example in english: She passed her driving test.
translation into uzbek: U haydovchilik imtihonidan o'tdi.

definition: Something such as a degree or a diploma that you get when you successfully finish a course of study
example in english: Simon left school with no qualifications.
translation into uzbek: Saymon maktabni hech qanday malakasiz tark etdi.

definition: To help someone to remember something
example in english: Remind Jenny to bring my CD when she comes.
translation into uzbek: Jeni kelganida mening diskimni olib kelishini eslating.

definition: A spoken or written description of a particular subject, situation, or event
example in english: We have to write a short report on the conference.
translation into uzbek: Biz konferensiya to'g'risida kichik bir hisobot yozishimiz kerak.

definition: To study your notes and information again in order to prepare for an examination
example in english: I've got a test tomorrow, so I have to revise tonight.
translation into uzbek: Ertaga imtihonim bor, shuning uchun bu kecha takrorlashim kerak.

definition: To try to find something or someone by looking carefully
example in english: After three days searching, I gave up.
translation into uzbek: 3 kun izlaganimdan so'ng, taslim bo'ldim (to'xtatdim).

example in english: The police have carried out an extensive search of the area.
translation into uzbek: Politsiya hududda keng qamrovli qidiruv ishlarini olib bordi.

definition: The ability to do something well, usually as a result of experience and training
example in english: Being a doctor demands a lot of skill.
translation into uzbek: Shifokor bo'lish ulkan mahorat talab qiladi.

example in english: Sophie is a very smart student.
translation into uzbek: Sofi juda aqlli o'quvchi.

definition: Something that you learn or teach at a school, for example English, mathematics, or biology
example in english: What's your favourite subject?
translation into uzbek: Sevimli faningiz qaysi?

example in english: I'm taking the exam in June.
translation into uzbek: Imtihonni iyunda topshiraman.

example in english: She's a talented singer.
translation into uzbek: U qobiliyatli qo'shiqchi.

definition: One of the periods of time that the year is divided into for students
example in english: How many weeks is it till the end of term?
translation into uzbek: Semester tugashiga necha hafta qoldi?

definition: To think about something because you want to know more facts
example in english: I was wondering about the best place for a holiday.
translation into uzbek: Men dam olish (ta'til) uchun eng yaxshi joy haqida o'ylayotgandim.

definition: In or to a foreign country
example in english: We try to go abroad at least once a year.
translation into uzbek: Biz yiliga eng kamida bir marta chet elga borishga harakat qilamiz.

definition: A place for someone to stay, live, or work in
example in english: The hotel provides accommodation for up to 100 people.
translation into uzbek: Mehmonxona 100 tagacha odamni turar joy bilan ta'minlaydi.

definition: To arrange to have or use something at a particular time in the future
example in english: Shall I book a room for you?
translation into uzbek: Siz uchun xona band qilib qo'yaymi?

definition: A period of time when you are not working and can rest or enjoy yourself
example in english: OK, let's take a fifteen-minute break.
translation into uzbek: Okey, keling 15 daqiqalik tanaffus qilamiz.

definition: To say that something that has been arranged will not now happen
example in english: The 4.05 train has been cancelled.
translation into uzbek: 4.05 dagi poyezd bekor qilindi.

definition: To get on a train, bus, plane, or boat that is travelling somewhere
example in english: I caught the next train to London.
translation into uzbek: Men Londonga ketayotgan keyingi poyezdga chiqdim.

definition: A comfortable bus for long journeys
example in english: Let's take the coach to Brighton this weekend.
translation into uzbek: Keling bu dam olish kunida Braytnga turistik avtobusda sayohat qilamiz.

definition: Easy for you to do, or suitable for your needs
example in english: Travelling underground is fast and convenient.
translation into uzbek: Metro orqali borish tez va qulay.

definition: If a vehicle crashes, or if someone crashes it, it hits something
example in english: Three people were killed when their car crashed into a tree.
translation into uzbek: Mashinalari daraxtga urilgan paytda, 3 kishi o'ldi.

definition: An accident that happens when a vehicle hits something
example in english: He was seriously injured in a car crash.
translation into uzbek: U avtohalokatda jiddiy jarohat oldi.

definition: Containing a lot of people or things
example in english: Was the pool crowded?
translation into uzbek: Basseyn tiqilinchmidi? (=Basseynda odam ko'pmidi?)

definition: A journey on a ship for pleasure, often visiting a series of places
example in english: I would love to go on a cruise round the Mediterranean.
translation into uzbek: Men O'rta Yer dengizi bo'ylab dengiz sayohatiga chiqishni istardim.

definition: To do something later than is planned or expected
example in english: They delayed the decision for as long as possible.
translation into uzbek: Ular qarorni iloji boricha uzoqroq vaqtga kechiktirishdi (=Bir qaror qabul qilishmadi).

definition: A situation in which something happens later or more slowly than you expected
example in english: After a long delay, the plane finally took off.
translation into uzbek: Uzoq kechikishdan so'ng, samalyot nihoyat havoga ko'tarildi.

definition: The place where someone or something is going
example in english: After eight hours on the road, we finally reached our destination.
translation into uzbek: 8 soat yo'lda yurgandan so'ng, biz nihoyat manzilimizga yetib bordik.

definition: A boat that makes short regular journeys between two or more places
example in english: They took the ferry to Dover.
translation into uzbek: Ular Doverga ketadigan qayiqqa chiqishdi.

example in english: The flight from New York to Heathrow took about five hours.
translation into uzbek: Nyu Yorkdan Hizrovga bo'lgan parvoz 5 soat oldi (5 soat davom etdi).

definition: From another country, or in another country
example in english: Do you speak any foreign languages?
translation into uzbek: Qandaydir chet tilida gaplasha olasizmi?

definition: An area of water next to the land where boats can stop
example in english: There were about twenty boats in the harbour.
translation into uzbek: Bandargohda taxminan 20 ta qayiq bor edi.

definition: An occasion when you travel from one place to another, especially over a long distance
example in english: We had a long journey ahead of us.
translation into uzbek: Oldinda bizni uzoq sayohat kutib turardi.

definition: Bags and suitcases that you take on a journey
example in english: We have to get our luggage when we get off the plane.
translation into uzbek: Samalyotdan tushganimizda yuklarimizni olishimiz kerak.

definition: A nearby place is not far away
example in english: Let's go to a nearby restaurant, shall we?
translation into uzbek: Yaqin atrofdagi restoranga boramizmi?

definition: Not far from where you are
example in english: My cousin lives nearby.
translation into uzbek: Mening qarindoshim shu yaqin atrofda yashaydi.

definition: To put your things into a bag, case, or box so that you can take or send them somewhere
example in english: He was still packing his suitcase when the taxi came.
translation into uzbek: Taksi kelganda, u hamon chamadonini yig‘ishtirib o‘tirgan edi (chamadoniga kiyimlarini joylab).

definition: An official document that contains your photograph and shows which country you are a citizen of
example in english: Bill has a Canadian passport.
translation into uzbek: Bilda Kanada pasporti bor.

definition: An area next to a railway track where passengers get onto and off trains
example in english: The train to Brussels will depart from platform 3.
translation into uzbek: Braselsga ketayotgan poyezd 3-platformadan jo'naydi.

definition: The system that is used for travelling or for moving goods from one place to another
example in english: Auckland's public transport system is excellent.
translation into uzbek: Oklend shahrining jamoat transport tizimi a'lo darajada.

example in english: We hoped to reach the camp before dark.
translation into uzbek: Lagerga qorong'u tushishdan avval yetib borishga umid qilgandik.

definition: A place where people go for a holiday
example in english: We stayed in a lovely ski resort.
translation into uzbek: Biz ajoyib chang'i kurortida tunadik.

definition: Something that you buy to remind you of a place that you visited on holiday or of a special event
example in english: This T-shirt with Big Ben on it will make a great souvenir.
translation into uzbek: Big Ben tasvirlangan bu futbolka ajoyib suviner bo'ladi.

definition: The vehicles that are travelling in an area at a particular time
example in english: At that time of night, there was no traffic on the roads.
translation into uzbek: Tunning o‘sha paytida, yo‘llarda hech qanday transport qatnovi yo‘q edi.

definition: An occasion when you go somewhere and come back again
example in english: The whole family went on a trip to Florida.
translation into uzbek: Butun oila Floridaga sayohatga ketishdi.

definition: A machine that you travel in or on, especially one with an engine that travels on roads, for example a car, bus, etc
example in english: Four vehicles were involved in the accident.
translation into uzbek: Avariyada 4 ta transport vositasi qatnashgan.

definition: To tell someone that you are sorry for doing something wrong
example in english: You should apologise to your brother.
translation into uzbek: Akangizdan kechirim so'rashingiz kerak.

definition: A man or boy that you are having a romantic relationship with
example in english: She's got a new boyfriend.
translation into uzbek: Uning yangi yigiti bor.

definition: Connected by shared feelings such as love and respect
example in english: My brother and I are very close.
translation into uzbek: Akam bilan men juda yaqinmiz.

definition: Certain about your abilities and not nervous or frightened
example in english: I was starting to feel more confident about the exam.
translation into uzbek: Imtihonga nisbatan o‘zimni yanada dadil his qila boshladim.

definition: A cool person is one that you like or admire, or is very fashionable
example in english: Jake is really cool.
translation into uzbek: Jake juda ham ajoyib!

definition: Two people who are married to each other, or who have a romantic relationship with each other
example in english: Bill and Melissa make a great couple.
translation into uzbek: Bil va Melisa juda zo'r juftlik bo'lishadi.

definition: To put new paint or paper on the walls of a room
example in english: We decorated the kitchen last weekend.
translation into uzbek: O'tgan hafta biz oshxonani bezatdik.

definition: To say things to support someone or something
example in english: We will defend their right to free speech.
translation into uzbek: Biz ularning so'z erkinligi huquqini himoya qilamiz.

definition: No longer married because your marriage has been legally ended
example in english: After they got divorced, she never remarried.
translation into uzbek: Ular ajrashishgandan so'ng, u hech qachon qayta turmush qurmadi.

definition: A set of rooms for living in, usually on one floor of a large building
example in english: The family live in a fourth-floor flat.
translation into uzbek: Oila to'rtinchi qavatdagi kvartirada yashaydi.

definition: Giving people more of your time or money than is usual or expected
example in english: She is a warm and generous human being.
translation into uzbek: U samimiy va sahiy inson.

definition: A girl or woman that you are having a romantic relationship with
example in english: Have you got a girlfriend?
translation into uzbek: Uchrashib yuradigan yoqtirgan qizingiz bormi?

definition: The feeling that you want to thank someone because they have given you something or done something for you
example in english: Thanks for coming with me. I'm really grateful.
translation into uzbek: Men bilan birga kelganingiz uchun rahmat. Juda ham minnatdorman.

definition: Someone that you have invited to your home or your party
example in english: He was a guest at our wedding.
translation into uzbek: U to'yimizda mehmon bo'ldi.

example in english: Michelle is young, independent and confident.
translation into uzbek: Mishel yosh, mustaqil va dadil.

definition: To tell someone another person's name when they meet for the first time
example in english: I'd like to introduce you to my friend Martin.
translation into uzbek: Sizni do'stim Martinga tanishtirmoqchiman.

example in english: Cats are really loving animals.
translation into uzbek: Mushuklar juda mehribon hayvonlardir.

definition: Someone who is loyal continues to support a person or organization, or idea in difficult times
example in english: These are people who have remained loyal to the company for years.
translation into uzbek: Bular kompaniyaga uzoq yillardan beri sodiq qolib kelayotgan odamlar.

definition: The way that someone is feeling, or the way that a group of people is feeling at a particular time
example in english: I had never seen Ann in such a good mood before.
translation into uzbek: Men Anni avval hech qachon bunchalar yaxshi kayfiyatda ko'rmagandim.

definition: A particular area of a town
example in english: We live in a quiet neighbourhood.
translation into uzbek: Biz tinch mahallada yashaymiz.

definition: Normal or average, and not unusual or special
example in english: It was just an ordinary Saturday morning.
translation into uzbek: U shunchaki odatiy bir shanba tongi edi.

definition: Someone who is patient is able to wait for a long time or deal with a difficult situation without becoming angry or upset
example in english: Susan is very patient with the children.
translation into uzbek: Syusen bu bolalar bilan juda sabrli.

definition: A private person does not talk to other people about their personal life or feelings
example in english: Damian is a very private person.
translation into uzbek: Demiyen shaxsiy hayoti yoki tuyg'ulari to'g'risida gapirmaydigan inson.

definition: To know someone or something because you have seen, heard, or met them before
example in english: I thought I recognised your voice!
translation into uzbek: Ovozingizni tanidim deb o'ylagandim!

example in english: All our relations are coming to the party.
translation into uzbek: Bizning hamma qarindoshlarimiz bazmga kelishadi.

definition: To pay money regularly to use a house, room, office, etc that belongs to someone else
example in english: How long have you been renting this place?
translation into uzbek: Bu yerda qancha vaqtdan beri ijaradasiz?

definition: An amount of money that you pay regularly for using a house, room, office, etc that belongs to someone else
example in english: After she'd paid her rent, Jan had no money left for food.
translation into uzbek: Ijara pulini to'laganidan so'ng, Jenning ovqat uchun hech qanday puli qolmadi.

definition: To treat someone in a way that shows that you think they are important and should be admired
example in english: People will respect you for telling the truth.
translation into uzbek: Odamlar haqiqatni gapirganingiz uchun hurmat qilishadi.

definition: The attitude that someone is important and should be admired, and that you should treat them politely
example in english: She's worked hard to gain the respect of her colleagues.
translation into uzbek: U hamkasblarining hurmatini qozonish uchun qattiq harakat qildi.

definition: Not married, or not in a romantic relationship
example in english: Please state whether you are single, married, or divorced.
translation into uzbek: Iltimos, turmush qurmagan, qurgan yoki ajrashganligingizni bildiring.

definition: Someone who you do not know
example in english: I didn't want to share a room with a complete stranger.
translation into uzbek: Men umuman notanish kimsa bilan bir xonada turishni xohlamadim.

definition: To believe that someone or something is good, honest, or reliable
example in english: You can trust Dana.
translation into uzbek: Danaga ishonsangiz bo'ladi.

definition: A feeling that you trust someone or something
example in english: The doctor-patient relationship has to be based on trust.
translation into uzbek: Shifokor va bemor o'rtasidagi aloqa ishonchga asoslangan bo'lishi kerak.

definition: An announcement in a newspaper, on television, on the internet, etc that is designed to persuade people to buy a product or service, go to an event, or apply for a job
example in english: I saw an advertisement for a new kind of camera.
translation into uzbek: Men yangi turdagi kameraning reklamasini ko'rdim.

definition: To have enough money to pay for something
example in english: I'm not sure how they're able to afford such expensive holidays.
translation into uzbek: Bunaqangi qimmat dam olishlarga qanday qilib pullari yetishini bilmayman.

definition: Something you buy that costs much less than normal
example in english: Her dress was a real bargain.
translation into uzbek: Uning ko'ylagi haqiqiy chegirmadagi mahsulot edi.

definition: A product or group of products that has its own name and is made by one particular company
example in english: I tried using a new brand of soap.
translation into uzbek: Yangi brenddagi sovunni ishlatib ko'rdim.

definition: A book that contains pictures of things that you can buy
example in english: Do you have a catalogue with all your products in it?
translation into uzbek: Hamma mahsulotingizni o'z ichiga jamlagan katalogingiz bormi?

example in english: I'm sorry, I haven't got any change.
translation into uzbek: Uzr, lekin tangam yo'q edi.

definition: A flat round piece of metal used as money
example in english: Put a coin into the slot.
translation into uzbek: Tirqishga tanga soling.

definition: If something costs an amount of money, you need that amount to pay for it or to do it
example in english: A new computer costs around €1,000.
translation into uzbek: Yangi kompyuter taxminan 1,000 yevro turadi.

definition: The amount of money that you need in order to buy something or to do something
example in english: What's the total cost of these three pairs of shoes?
translation into uzbek: Mana bu 3 juft oyoq kiyimning umumiy narxi qancha?

definition: A person or company that buys goods or services
example in english: Supermarkets use a variety of ways to attract customers.
translation into uzbek: Xaridorlarni jalb qilish uchun supermarketlar turli-tuman yo'llardan foydalanishadi.

definition: An amount of money that you owe
example in english: By this time we had debts of over €15,000.
translation into uzbek: Bu paytgacha, 15,000 yevrodan ziyod qarzimiz bor edi.

definition: To say strongly that you want something
example in english: The teacher demanded an explanation for all the water on the floor.
translation into uzbek: O'qituvchi poldagi suv uchun izoh talab qildi.

definition: To send a product to another country so that it can be sold there
example in english: Their flowers are exported around the world.
translation into uzbek: Ularning gullari dunyo bo'ylab eksport qilinadi.

definition: Money that you pay to a professional person or institution for their work
example in english: He will have to pay school fees of €2,000.
translation into uzbek: U 2,000 yevro maktab haqini to'lashiga to'g'ri keladi.

example in english: They must have spent a fortune on flowers.
translation into uzbek: Gullar uchun ancha ko'p pul sarflashgan bo'lishsa kerak.

definition: To buy a product from another country and bring it to your country
example in english: We import most of our coal from other countries.
translation into uzbek: Ko'mirning katta qismini boshqa davlatlardan import qilamiz.

definition: To use your money with the aim of making a profit from it
example in english: Banks invested €20 million in the scheme.
translation into uzbek: Banklar ushbu loyihaga 20 million yevro sarmoya kiritishgan.

definition: To get something that you want or need
example in english: She has to obtain her father's permission before she does anything.
translation into uzbek: Qandaydir ish qilishdan avval, u otasining ijozatini olishiga to'g'ri keladi.

definition: To have to give someone a particular amount of money because you have bought something or have borrowed money from them
example in english: Pam still owes me €5.
translation into uzbek: Pam haliyam mendan 5 yevro qarz.

definition: To legally have something, especially because you have bought it
example in english: Who owns that house by the lake?
translation into uzbek: Ko'l bo'yidagi uyga kim egalik qiladi?

definition: Money that you get when you sell something for a price that is higher than the cost of making it or buying it
example in english: Investors have made a 14 percent profit in just three months.
translation into uzbek: Sarmoyachilar bor yo'g'i 3 oyda 14% foyda ko'rdilar.

example in english: The books are my personal property.
translation into uzbek: Kitoblar mening shaxsiy mulkim.

example in english: She purchased a new lamp for her bedroom.
translation into uzbek: U yotoqxonasi uchun yangi lampa sotib oldi.

example in english: Her latest purchase was a long black coat.
translation into uzbek: Uning oxirgi xaridi uzun qora palto edi.

definition: A document that you get from someone showing that you have given them money or goods
example in english: Make sure you get a receipt for the taxi.
translation into uzbek: Taksi uchun chekni olishni unutmang.

example in english: Working with these children requires a great deal of patience.
translation into uzbek: Bu bolalar bilan ishlash ulkan sabr-matonat talab qiladi.

definition: An event or period of time during which a shop reduces the prices of some of its goods
example in english: The Easter sales start tomorrow.
translation into uzbek: Pasxa bayrami chegirmalari ertaga boshlanadi.

definition: To regularly put money in a bank, or to invest it so that you can use it later
example in english: Don't wait until you're 40 to start saving for retirement.
translation into uzbek: Nafaqa payti uchun pul jamg'arishni 40 yoshga to'lgunga qadar kutmang.

definition: To choose someone or something from a group
example in english: You can select one of four colors.
translation into uzbek: 4 ta rangdan birini tanlashingiz mumkin.

definition: To provide someone or something with something that they need or want
example in english: Our shop supplies things to people all over the country.
translation into uzbek: Bizning do'konimiz butun mamlakat bo'ylab odamlarga narsalar ta'minlaydi.

definition: An amount or quantity of something that is available to use
example in english: We have a good supply of fresh water here.
translation into uzbek: Bu yerda toza suvning katta ta'minoti bor.

definition: A number of different people or things
example in english: Adults study for a variety of reasons.
translation into uzbek: Kattalar turli-tuman sabablarga ko'ra o'qishadi.

definition: To use more of something than is necessary, or to use it in a way that does not produce the best results
example in english: Don't waste water like that—turn the tap off when you're not using it!
translation into uzbek: Suvni bunaqangi isrof qilmang–ishlatmayotganizgizda jo'mrakni o'chirib qo'ying!

definition: The failure to use something that is valuable or useful in an effective way
example in english: All this uneaten food—what a waste!
translation into uzbek: Bu yeyilmagan ovqatlarning bari–qanchalar isrofgarchilik a!

definition: Not natural or real, but made by people
example in english: There was a vase of artificial flowers on the table.
translation into uzbek: Stol ustida sun'iy gullar bilan vaz bor edi.

definition: An automatic machine can work by itself without being operated by people
example in english: It's an automatic door.
translation into uzbek: Bu avtomatik eshik.

definition: Difficult to do, deal with, or understand
example in english: This is a complicated problem.
translation into uzbek: Bu murakkab muammo.

example in english: The number of visitors has decreased significantly.
translation into uzbek: Mehmonlar soni sezilarli darajada kamaydi.

definition: The amount by which something is less
example in english: There's been a decrease in the number of visitors.
translation into uzbek: Mehmonlar sonida kamayish bo'ldi.

definition: Storing information such as sound or pictures as numbers or electronic signals
example in english: It's a digital recording.
translation into uzbek: Bu raqamli yozuv.

definition: To find something that was hidden or that no one knew about before
example in english: William Herschel discovered Uranus in 1781.
translation into uzbek: Uilyam Herschel Uranusni 1781 yilda kashf etdi.

definition: A change that is produced in one person or thing by another
example in english: Scientists are studying the chemical's effect on the environment.
translation into uzbek: Olimlar kimyoviy moddalar ta'sirini atrof-muhitda o'rganmoqda.

definition: The tools, machines, or other things that you need for a particular job or activity
example in english: A computer is the most important piece of equipment you will buy.
translation into uzbek: Kompyuter siz sotib oladigan eng muhim uskunadir.

definition: To guess or calculate an amount or value by using available information
example in english: It is impossible to estimate how many of the residents were affected.
translation into uzbek: Qanchalik ko'p aholi ta'sirlanganligini baholash imkonsiz.

definition: Done, made, or described with all the details correct
example in english: The exact number of people there was unknown.
translation into uzbek: U yerda aniq odam soni ma'lum emas edi.

definition: To perform scientific tests in order to find out what happens to someone or something in particular conditions
example in english: This lab does not experiment on animals.
translation into uzbek: Ushbu laboratoriya hayvonlar ustida tajriba o'tkazmaydi.

definition: A scientific test to find out what happens to someone or something in particular conditions
example in english: Researchers now need to do more experiments.
translation into uzbek: Tadqiqotchilar endi ko'proq tajribalar o'tkazishlari kerak.

definition: A small tool or piece of equipment that does something that is useful or impressive
example in english: That's a very useful gadget!
translation into uzbek: Bu juda foydali qurilma!

example in english: Printers and modems are examples of hardware.
translation into uzbek: Printerning va modemlar apparat qismlariga misol bo'ladi.

definition: To design or create something that did not exist before
example in english: Alfred Nobel invented dynamite.
translation into uzbek: Alfred Nobel dinamitni ixtiro qildi.

definition: To include something as part of an activity, event, or situation
example in english: The course involves a lot of hard work.
translation into uzbek: Kurs ko'p mehnat talab qiladi.

definition: A building or large room where people do scientific research
example in english: This is our new research laboratory.
translation into uzbek: Bu bizning yangi tadqiqot laboratoriyamiz.

definition: To not have something, or to not have enough of something
example in english: He lacked the skills required for the job.
translation into uzbek: U ish uchun kerakli ko'nikmalarga ega emas edi.

Uzbek Translation: biron nimaga ega bo'lmaslik, yoki yetarlicha bo'lmaslik
definition: A situation in which you do not have something, or do not have enough of something
example in english: The match was cancelled because of lack of support.
translation into uzbek: O'yin qo'llab-quvvatlashning etishmasligi sababli bekor qilindi.

definition: A small computer that you can carry with you
example in english: I'm going to buy a new laptop.
translation into uzbek: Men yangi noutbuk sotib olmoqchiman.

definition: The largest in amount, size, or number that is allowed or possible
example in english: The maximum amount of cash you can withdraw is €500.
translation into uzbek: Naqd pulni yechib olishning maksimal miqdori €500.

definition: The smallest in amount, size, or number that is allowed or possible
example in english: What's the minimum voting age in your country?
translation into uzbek: Sizning mamlakatingizda minimal ovoz berish yoshi qancha?

definition: If equipment operates, or if you operate it, you use or control it and it works in the way it should
example in english: Do not operate machinery after taking this medication.
translation into uzbek: Ushbu dorini ichganingizdan keyin mashinalarni boshqarmang.

definition: A very common light, strong substance that is produced by a chemical process and used for making many different things
example in english: This pen is made of plastic.
translation into uzbek: Ushbu qalam plastikdan qilingan.

example in english: Have you got a plastic bag?
translation into uzbek: Sizda plastik sumka bormi?

definition: To make a computer or other piece of equipment do something automatically
example in english: Can you program the PC to come on in the morning?
translation into uzbek: Siz kompyuterni ertalab yoqish uchun dasturlashni amalga oshira olasizmi?

definition: A series of instructions that makes a computer do something
example in english: It's a complicated computer program.
translation into uzbek: Bu murakkab kompyuter dasturi.

definition: The detailed study of something in order to discover new facts
example in english: Scientists have carried out lots of research into the effects of these drugs.
translation into uzbek: Olimlar ushbu dori-darmonlarning ta'sirini ko'p tadqiqot qilishdi.

definition: If you run a computer program, or if it runs, you start it or use it
example in english: The software will run on any PC.
translation into uzbek: Dastur har qanday kompyuterda ishlaydi.

definition: The flat surface on a computer, television, or piece of electronic equipment where words and pictures are shown
example in english: Suddenly the screen went blank.
translation into uzbek: To'satdan ekran o'chib qoldi.

definition: The programs used by computers for doing particular jobs
example in english: You log onto our website, then download and install the software.
translation into uzbek: Siz bizning veb-saytimizga kirib, dasturini yuklab o'rnatishingiz kerak.

definition: Happening very quickly and without any sign that it is going to happen
example in english: She felt a sudden pain in her leg.
translation into uzbek: U oyoqida to'satdan og'riq his etdi.

definition: Advanced scientific knowledge that is used for practical purposes
example in english: Technology is improving all the time.
translation into uzbek: Texnologiya har doim yaxshilanib bormoqda.

definition: Not the same as anything or anyone else
example in english: Every person is unique.
translation into uzbek: Har bir inson o'ziga xosdir.

definition: A way of pronouncing words that shows what country, region, or social class you come from.
example in english: Tom hasn't lost his broad Irish accent.
translation into uzbek: Tom o'zining kuchli irlandcha aksentini yo'qotmagan.

definition: A public statement that gives people information about something.
example in english: The head teacher made an announcement about the school holidays.
translation into uzbek: Maktab direktori ta'tillar to'g'risida e'lon qildi.

definition: To send out messages or programs to be received by radios or televisions.
example in english: The BBC will be broadcasting the match live from Paris.
translation into uzbek: BBC o'yinni Parijdan jonli efirda namoyish etadi.

example in english: They mentioned the problem on Channel 5's main news broadcast.
translation into uzbek: Muammo 5-kanalning asosiy yangiliklar ko‘rsatuvida aytib o'tildi.

definition: A television station and the programs that it broadcasts.
example in english: What's on the other channel?
translation into uzbek: Boshqa kanalda nima beryapti?

example in english: Clear instructions are provided.
translation into uzbek: Tushunishga oson ko'rsatmalar ta'minlanadi.

definition: To make a computer do something by pressing a button on the mouse.
example in english: To send the message, click on the 'send' button.
translation into uzbek: Xabarni yuborish uchun, 'jo'natish' tugmasini bosing.

definition: To communicate with someone by phone, e-mail, letter, etc.
example in english: Please contact us if you have any information.
translation into uzbek: Agar qandaydir ma'lumot bo'lsa, iltimos biz bilan bog'laning.

definition: Communication between people, countries, or organizations.
example in english: Do you and Jo still keep in contact?
translation into uzbek: Siz hozir ham Jo bilan aloqani saqlab qolganmisiz?

definition: A set of information that is stored on a computer and that is given a particular name.
example in english: I can't find the file on my computer.
translation into uzbek: Faylni kompyuterimdan topolmayapman.

definition: Suitable for serious situations or occasions.
example in english: Ameliorate' is a more formal way of saying 'improve'.
translation into uzbek: Ijobiy tarafga o'zgartirmoq' - bu 'yaxshilamoq' so'zini aytishning yanayam rasmiyroq usuli.

definition: A picture, especially one in a mirror or on a computer, television, or cinema screen.
example in english: Images of Germany appeared on the screen.
translation into uzbek: Ekranda Germaniya tasvirlari paydo bo'ldi.

example in english: You should wear informal clothes to the party tomorrow.
translation into uzbek: Ertangi bazmga norasmiy kiyinishingiz kerak.

definition: A computer system that allows people in different parts of the world to exchange information.
example in english: Do you have access to the Internet?
translation into uzbek: Internetga kirish imkoniyatiga egamisiz?

definition: To say or do something that stops someone when they are speaking or concentrating on something.
example in english: Please don't interrupt her while she's working.
translation into uzbek: Iltimos, uni ishlayotganda bezovta qilmang.

definition: If people, things, or events are linked, they are related to each other in some way.
example in english: Police think that the two robberies are linked.
translation into uzbek: Politsiyaning fikricha ikki o'g'irlik bir-biriga bog'liq.

definition: A connection between two or more people, places, facts, or events.
example in english: Is there any link between this and what we were talking about yesterday?
translation into uzbek: Kecha gaplashayotgan narsamiz bilan buni o'rtasida qandaydir bog'liqlik mavjudmi?

definition: Radio, television, newspapers, the Internet, and magazines, considered as a group.
example in english: The story has been widely reported in the media.
translation into uzbek: Hikoya ommaviy axborot vositalarida keng tarqaldi.

definition: A small phone that you can carry around with you.
example in english: Don't forget to take your mobile phone with you when you go out.
translation into uzbek: Ko'chaga chiqqaningizda, uyali aloqa telefoningizni o'zingiz bilan olib olishni unutmang.

definition: Connected to or available through the Internet.
example in english: I bought it from an online bookshop.
translation into uzbek: Uni internet kitob do'konidan sotib oldim.

example in english: Let's go online and check your e-mail.
translation into uzbek: Keling internetga ulanib, elektron pochtangizni tekshiramiz.

definition: To stop moving or doing something for a short time before starting again.
example in english: She paused at the door and then left.
translation into uzbek: U eshik oldida biroz to'xtab turdi va so'ngra jo'nab ketdi.

definition: A short time when someone stops moving or doing something before starting again.
example in english: There was a short pause before the orchestra continued to play.
translation into uzbek: Orkestra chalishni davom ettirishidan avval qisqa pauza bo'ldi.

definition: To make someone agree to do something by giving them reasons why they should.
example in english: He did finally come with us, although it took a long time to persuade him.
translation into uzbek: Uni ko'ndirishga uzoq vaqt ketganiga qaramay, u oxir-oqibat biz bilan keldi.

definition: To say the sounds of words.
example in english: I find some Japanese words very difficult to pronounce.
translation into uzbek: Ba'zi yaponcha so'zlar men uchun talaffuz qilishga qiyin.

definition: To produce many copies of a book, magazine, or newspaper for people to buy.
example in english: Their company publishes a wide selection of books.
translation into uzbek: Ularning kompaniyasi keng turdagi/to'plamdagi kitoblar chop etadi.

definition: To provide information about something, especially to people in authority.
example in english: You should report the accident to the police.
translation into uzbek: Politsiyaga avariya to'g'risida xabar berishingiz lozim.

definition: A spoken or written description of a particular subject, situation, or event.
example in english: A new report shows crime is on the increase.
translation into uzbek: Yangi hisobot shuni ko'rsatadiki, jinoyatlar soni ortib bormoqda.

definition: To ask for something, or to ask someone to do something, in a polite or formal way.
example in english: I would like to request a meeting with the manager, please.
translation into uzbek: Men menejer bilan uchrashuv belgilashni so'ramoqchiman, iltimos.

definition: An act of asking for something in a polite or formal way.
example in english: Evening meals are available on request.
translation into uzbek: Kechki ovqatlar so'rov bo'yicha mavjud.

definition: To call someone on the telephone.
example in english: Ring me at home later.
translation into uzbek: Keyinroq uyda menga qo'ng'iroq qiling.

definition: A movement or sound that is made by someone and has a special meaning for another person.
example in english: We waited for them to give us the signal to move.
translation into uzbek: Harakatlanishga ishora berishlarini kutdik.

definition: To use words that are deliberately offensive, for example because you are angry.
example in english: That's the first time I've ever heard him swear.
translation into uzbek: Men uning so'kinishini birinchi marta eshitib turibman.

definition: A group of people or things with similar qualities that make them different from other groups.
example in english: She quickly typed back a response.
translation into uzbek: U tezlik bilan javob yozib yubordi.

example in english: Our regular viewers will know that it's time for Double Money!
translation into uzbek: Bizning doimiy tomoshabinlarimiz Ikki Karra Pul ko'rsatuvining vaqti kelganini bilishadi!

definition: A place on the Internet where information is available about a particular subject, company, university, etc.
example in english: I'm thinking of starting a website for people from our school.
translation into uzbek: Maktabimizdan bo'lgan odamlar uchun vebsayt yuritish haqida o'ylayapman.

definition: To speak very quietly to someone, so that other people cannot hear you.
example in english: Stop whispering, you two!
translation into uzbek: Hoy siz ikkovingiz, pichirlashni bas qiling!

definition: A very quiet way of saying something to someone so that other people cannot hear you.
example in english: Be careful!' she said in a whisper.
translation into uzbek: U past ovozda 'Ehtiyot bo'ling!' deb aytdi.

definition: To say that you have done something wrong.
example in english: In court, he admitted that he had lied about the accident.
translation into uzbek: Sudda u avariya haqida yolg'on gapirganini tan oldi.

definition: If the police arrest someone, they take that person to a police station because they think that he or she has committed a crime.
example in english: The police entered the building and arrested six men.
translation into uzbek: Politsiya binoga kirib, olti odamni hibsga oldi.

definition: An organization that gives money and help to people who need it; money or food that is given to people who need it.
example in english: The event raised €59,000 for charity.
translation into uzbek: Tadbir xayriya uchun €59,000 yig'di.

definition: To do something that is illegal.
example in english: What makes people commit crimes?
translation into uzbek: Odamlarni jinoyat qilishga nima majbur qiladi?

definition: The people who live in an area.
example in english: I wanted to work somewhere where I could serve the community.
translation into uzbek: Men jamoatga xizmat qila oladigan joyda ishlamoqchi edim.

definition: A place where trials take place and legal cases are decided.
example in english: The man will appear in court on Monday.
translation into uzbek: Erkak dushanba kuni sudga chiqadi.

definition: Someone who has committed a crime.
example in english: Some criminals take exams in prison.
translation into uzbek: Ba'zi jinoyatchilar qamoqxonada imtihon topshirishadi.

example in english: That's criminal behavior!
translation into uzbek: Bu jinoyat xulq-atvori!

definition: A society that has its own set of ideas, beliefs, and ways of behaving.
example in english: There were people from lots of different cultures at the meeting.
translation into uzbek: Yig'ilishda ko'plab turli madaniyatlardan odamlar bo'ldi.

definition: Well known to you, or easily recognized by you.
example in english: The name Harry Potter will be familiar to many readers.
translation into uzbek: Garri Potter ismi ko'p o'quvchilarga tanish bo'ladi.

definition: The people who control a country or area and make decisions about its laws and taxes.
example in english: The government has announced plans to raise the minimum wage next year.
translation into uzbek: Hukumat kelasi yil uchun minimal ish haqini oshirish rejasini e'lon qildi.

example in english: Biting your fingernails is a very bad habit!
translation into uzbek: Tirnoqlarni tishlash juda yomon odat!

definition: An official document that shows who you are.
example in english: The police officer asked to see my identity card.
translation into uzbek: Politsiya xodimi mening shaxsiy guvohnomamni ko'rishni so'radi.

example in english: Robbing banks is illegal.
translation into uzbek: Banklarni o'g'irlash noqonuniy hisoblanadi.

definition: The ideas and activities involved in getting power in an area or governing it.
example in english: She's heavily involved in local politics.
translation into uzbek: U mahalliy siyosatda faol ishtirok etmoqda.

definition: The number of people who live in a particular area.
example in english: Los Angeles has a population of over 3 million.
translation into uzbek: Los-Anjelesning aholisi 3 milliondan ortiq.

definition: An institution where people are kept as a punishment for committing a crime.
example in english: He's currently in prison.
translation into uzbek: U hozirda qamoqdamiz.

definition: To show publicly that you oppose something.
example in english: Workers are protesting against high unemployment.
translation into uzbek: Ishchilar yuqori ishsizlikka qarshi norozilik bildirmoqda.

definition: An occasion when people show strong public opposition to something.
example in english: Students will hold a protest this weekend outside Parliament.
translation into uzbek: Talabalar bu hafta oxirida Parlament oldida norozilik namoyishi o'tkazadilar.

definition: Someone who lives in a particular place.
example in english: Many local residents have objected to the new road.
translation into uzbek: Ko'plab mahalliy aholi yangi yo'lga qarshi chiqdi.

definition: If you are responsible for something that has happened, you caused it, or you deserve to be blamed for it; in charge of someone or something.
example in english: He was responsible for the accident.
translation into uzbek: U avariya uchun javobgar edi.

definition: To take money or property from someone illegally.
example in english: They were planning to rob the museum.
translation into uzbek: Ular muzeyni o'g'irlashni rejalashtirishgan.

definition: Your usual way of doing things.
example in english: It shouldn't take too long to return to our old routine.
translation into uzbek: Eski tartibimizga qaytish uzoq vaqt olmaydi.

definition: Ordinary and not interesting or special.
example in english: This is just routine work.
translation into uzbek: Bu oddiy ish.

definition: A plan of activities or events and when they will happen.
example in english: What's your schedule for today?
translation into uzbek: Bugungi jadvalingiz qanday?

definition: The set of conditions that exist at a particular time in a particular place.
example in english: I found myself in an embarrassing situation.
translation into uzbek: Men o'zimni noqulay vaziyatda topdim.

definition: Relating to society and to people's lives in general.
example in english: There are lots of social problems, such as unemployment.
translation into uzbek: Ijtimoiy muammolar, masalan, ishsizlik, ko'p.

definition: People in general living together in organized communities, with laws and traditions controlling how they behave towards each other.
example in english: Society has to support its old people.
translation into uzbek: Jamiyat o'zining keksa insonlarini qo'llab-quvvatlashi kerak.

definition: To take something that belongs to someone else without permission.
example in english: She was caught stealing food from the supermarket.
translation into uzbek: U supermarketdan ovqat o'g'irlashda qo'lga olindi.

definition: A very old custom, belief, or story.
example in english: His son followed the family tradition and entered politics.
translation into uzbek: Uning o'g'li oilaviy an'analarni davom ettirib, siyosatga kirgan.

definition: Like most things of the same type.
example in english: His opinions are typical of people of his generation.
translation into uzbek: Uning fikrlari o'z avlodidagi odamlar uchun xosdir.

definition: To decide something, or to choose a representative or winner, by officially stating your choice, for example in an election.
example in english: I'm going to vote for Jackson.
translation into uzbek: Men Jekson uchun ovoz beraman.

definition: An official choice you make between two or more issues, people, etc., for example in an election.
example in english: My vote will go to the candidate who promises lower taxes.
translation into uzbek: Mening ovozim soliqni kamaytirishni va'da qilgan nomzodga boradi.

definition: A place where young people can go to meet and take part in activities.
example in english: Let's go to the youth club after school.
translation into uzbek: Maktabdan so'ng yoshlar klubiga boramiz

definition: Something that you very much want to achieve.
example in english: His ambition was to become a successful writer.
translation into uzbek: Uning maqsadi muvaffaqiyatli yozuvchi bo'lish edi.

definition: A formal request to do something or have something, for example, a job.
example in english: His application for membership was rejected.
translation into uzbek: Uning a'zolik uchun arizasi rad etildi.

definition: An arrangement with a bank that allows you to keep your money there.
example in english: We'll pay the money into your bank account.
translation into uzbek: Pulni sizning bank hisobingizga o'tkazamiz.

definition: The person who is in charge of you at work.
example in english: I asked my boss for a day off next week.
translation into uzbek: Men o'z boshimdan keyingi hafta bir kun ta'til so'radim.

definition: A job or profession that you work at for some time.
example in english: Rosen had decided on an academic career.
translation into uzbek: Rosen akademik karera tanlagan edi.

definition: Someone who works in the same organization or department as you.
example in english: Friends and colleagues will remember him as a kind man.
translation into uzbek: Do'stlar va hamkasblar uni mehribon inson sifatida eslaydi.

definition: An organization that sells services or goods.
example in english: Max works for a large oil company.
translation into uzbek: Max katta neft kompaniyasida ishlaydi.

definition: A written legal agreement between two people or organizations.
example in english: After six months, she was offered a contract of employment.
translation into uzbek: Olti oydan so'ng, unga ish shartnomasi taklif qilindi.

definition: A section in a government, organization, or business that deals with a particular type of work.
example in english: You need to speak to our sales department.
translation into uzbek: Siz bizning savdo bo'limimiz bilan gaplashishingiz kerak.

definition: If you deserve something, it is right that you get it because of the way that you are or the way that you have behaved.
example in english: After five hours on your feet, you deserve a break.
translation into uzbek: Besh soat oyoq ustida turganingizdan so'ng, dam olishga haqliysiz.

definition: To receive money for work that you do.
example in english: Most people here earn about €30,000 a year.
translation into uzbek: Bu yerda ko'pchilik odamlar yilda taxminan €30,000 ishlaydi.

example in english: Albert Finney rose to fame in the British cinema of the early Sixties.
translation into uzbek: Albert Finney 1960-yillarning boshlaridagi britaniya kinolarida mashhur bo'ldi.

definition: The action of putting a ball into a goal in a game such as football.
example in english: Nielsen scored two goals in the last ten minutes.
translation into uzbek: Nielsen oxirgi o'n daqiqada ikki gol urdi.

definition: If someone or something impresses you, you admire them.
example in english: Her ability to deal with problems impresses me.
translation into uzbek: Muammolarni hal qilish qobiliyati meni ta'sir qiladi.

definition: Money that someone gets from working or from investing money.
example in english: What is your approximate annual income?
translation into uzbek: Sizning taxminiy yillik daromadingiz qancha?

definition: All the businesses involved in producing a particular type of goods or services.
example in english: How long have you worked in the oil industry?
translation into uzbek: Siz neft sanoatida qancha vaqt ishladingiz?

definition: To ask someone, especially someone famous, questions about themselves, their work, or their ideas.
example in english: He was interviewed on the radio this morning.
translation into uzbek: U bugun ertalab radio orqali intervyu berdi.

definition: A meeting in which someone asks another person, especially a famous person, questions about themselves, their work, or their ideas.
example in english: This is her first interview since becoming Olympic champion.
translation into uzbek: Bu uning Olimpiya chempioni bo'lganidan keyingi birinchi intervyusi.

definition: Someone who is in charge of a group, organization, or country.
example in english: Victoria became a manager because she's a good leader.
translation into uzbek: Viktoriya yaxshi rahbar bo'lgani uchun menejer bo'ldi.

definition: Someone whose job is to organize and control the work of a business, a department, or the people who work there.
example in english: I'd like to speak to the manager.
translation into uzbek: Men menejer bilan gaplashmoqchiman.

definition: An amount of money that someone receives regularly when they no longer work because of their age or because they are ill.
example in english: My grandma stopped working three years ago and now she gets a pension.
translation into uzbek: Mening buvim uch yil oldin ishlashni to'xtatdi va endi pensiya oladi.

definition: A situation in which someone does not have enough money to pay for their basic needs.
example in english: Half the world's population is living in poverty.
translation into uzbek: Dunyoning yarmi qashshoqlikda yashamoqda.

definition: Attempts to persuade or force someone to do something.
example in english: My parents put me under a lot of pressure at school.
translation into uzbek: Mening ota-onam meni maktabda katta bosim ostida qo'yishdi.

definition: A previous event, period, or thing happened or existed before the one that you are talking about.
example in english: All the other guests had arrived the previous day.
translation into uzbek: Boshqa barcha mehmonlar oldingi kunda kelishgan edi.

definition: A job that you need special skills and qualifications to do.
example in english: Her father discouraged her from going into the legal profession.
translation into uzbek: Uning otasi uni huquq sohasiga kirishdan qaytardi.

definition: To stop working permanently, especially when you are old.
example in english: He retired from the army last month.
translation into uzbek: U o‘tgan oy armiyadan nafaqaga chiqdi.

definition: A fixed amount of money that you earn each month or year from your job.
example in english: Lisa gets an annual salary of €30,000.
translation into uzbek: Liza yillik €30,000 maosh oladi.

definition: The people who work for a particular company, organization, or institution.
example in english: She joined the staff in 1996.
translation into uzbek: U 1996-yilda xodimlar safiga qo'shildi.

definition: A period of time during which people refuse to work, as a protest.
example in english: There's a tram strike in the city.
translation into uzbek: Shaharda tramvay ish tashladi.

definition: To make someone pay money to the government.
example in english: Everyone in my country pays 20 per cent tax on any money they earn.
translation into uzbek: Mening mamlakatimda har kim o'z daromadidan 20 foiz soliq to'laydi.

definition: An amount of money that you have to pay to the government.
example in english: The government has promised to lower taxes after the election.
translation into uzbek: Hukumat saylovlardan keyin soliqni kamaytirishni va'da qildi.

example in english: Ian became a very wealthy businessman.
translation into uzbek: Ian juda boy ishbilarmon bo'ldi.

definition: To change or influence something, often in a negative way.
example in english: Did the newspapers really affect the outcome of the election?
translation into uzbek: Gazetalar saylov natijalariga haqiqatan ta'sir qildimi?

definition: To create or preserve a good or correct balance between different features or aspects.
example in english: We have to balance the needs and tastes of all our customers.
translation into uzbek: Biz barcha mijozlarimizning ehtiyojlari va didlarini muvozanatlashimiz kerak.

definition: A situation in which different aspects or features are treated equally or exist in the correct relationship to each other.
example in english: A healthy diet is about getting the correct balance of a variety of foods.
translation into uzbek: Sog'lom dieta turli xil oziq-ovqatlarning to'g'ri muvozanatini olish haqida.

definition: To get an advantage, or to give someone an advantage.
example in english: Thousands of people could benefit from the invention.
translation into uzbek: Minglab odamlar ixtiro foydasini ko'rishi mumkin.

definition: An advantage that you get from a situation.
example in english: He has had the benefit of the best education money can buy.
translation into uzbek: U pul bilan sotib olinadigan eng yaxshi ta'limdan foydalanib kelmoqda.

definition: To take air into your lungs through your nose or mouth and let it out again.
example in english: Doctors said he was having difficulty breathing.
translation into uzbek: Doktorlar uning nafas olishda qiyinchilik yuzaga kelganini aytishdi.

definition: To use your teeth to bite food in your mouth into small pieces.
example in english: She chewed her food slowly.
translation into uzbek: U ovqatini sekin-sekin chaynadi.

definition: To cut something such as food or wood into pieces.
example in english: Chop the meat into small pieces.
translation into uzbek: Go'shtni kichik bo'laklarga kesing.

example in english: The envelope contained a few old photographs.
translation into uzbek: Konvertda bir necha eski fotosuratlar bor edi.

definition: To force air up through your throat with a sudden noise, especially when you have a cold or when you want to get someone's attention.
example in english: My chest felt painful, and I was coughing uncontrollably.
translation into uzbek: Ko'kragim og'rirdi va men nazorat qilinmaydigan yo'talib turardim.

definition: The action of coughing, or the sound that you make when you cough.
example in english: I've got a bad cough.
translation into uzbek: Men yomon yo'taldim.

definition: To stop someone from being affected by an illness.
example in english: Only an operation will cure her.
translation into uzbek: Faqat operatsiya uni davolaydi.

definition: A medicine or treatment that makes someone who is ill become healthy.
example in english: Doctors say there are several possible cures.
translation into uzbek: Doktorlar bir necha mumkin bo'lgan davolar borligini aytishadi.

definition: To do a physical activity in order to stay healthy and to make your body stronger.
example in english: Do you eat properly and exercise regularly?
translation into uzbek: Siz to'g'ri ovqatlanasizmi va muntazam jismoniy mashqlar qilasizmi?

definition: Physical activity that you do in order to stay healthy and make your body stronger.
example in english: I get plenty of exercise being an aerobics instructor.
translation into uzbek: Aerobika instruktor sifatida ko'p jismoniy mashqlar qilaman.

definition: A very common infectious disease that lasts for a short time and makes you feel weak and tired.
example in english: My dad has got flu.
translation into uzbek: Mening dadam grippdan aziyat chekmoqda.

definition: The process of cutting into someone's body for medical reasons.
example in english: The baby had to have an operation.
translation into uzbek: Bolaga operatsiya qilish kerak edi.

example in english: I feel very healthy at the moment.
translation into uzbek: Hozirda juda sog'lom his qilaman.

definition: To not consider something, or to not let it influence you.
example in english: We had ignored the fact that it was getting darker.
translation into uzbek: Biz qorayib borayotgan faktni e'tiborsiz qoldirdik.

definition: A disease that is caused by bacteria or by a virus.
example in english: I've got a throat infection.
translation into uzbek: Men tomoq infektsiyasidan aziyat chekmoqdaman.

definition: One of the foods or liquids that you use in making a particular meal.
example in english: Mix all the ingredients together carefully.
translation into uzbek: Barcha ingredientlarni ehtiyotkorlik bilan aralashtiring.

example in english: All the passengers in the vehicle escaped injury.
translation into uzbek: Transportdagi barcha yo'lovchilar jarohatlanmasdan qutuldilar.

definition: To prevent a number, amount, or effect from increasing past a particular point.
example in english: We want to limit classes to a maximum of 30 pupils.
translation into uzbek: Darslarni maksimal 30 nafar o'quvchi bilan cheklamoqchimiz.

definition: The greatest amount of something that is possible or allowed.
example in english: The speed limit here is 40 miles an hour.
translation into uzbek: Bu yerda tezlik cheklovi soatiga 40 milya.

definition: An occasion when you eat, such as breakfast or lunch, or the food that you eat at that time.
example in english: He cooked us a delicious meal.
translation into uzbek: U bizga mazali taom tayyorladi.

definition: A small piece of solid medicine that you swallow with water.
example in english: Did you remember to take your pills this morning?
translation into uzbek: Bugun ertalab dorilaringizni olishni eslab qoldingizmi?

definition: To become fit and healthy again after an illness or injury.
example in english: I haven't fully recovered from the flu.
translation into uzbek: Men grippdan to'liq tuzalmadim.

definition: Containing salt, or tasting like salt.
example in english: This soup is very salty.
translation into uzbek: Bu sho'rva juda sho'r.

definition: To cut something into flat pieces.
example in english: I'll slice some bread.
translation into uzbek: Men ozroq nonni kesaman.

definition: A flat piece of food that has been cut from something larger.
example in english: Cut the bread into thick slices.
translation into uzbek: Nonni qalin bo'laklarga kesing.

definition: With a taste like a lemon.
example in english: If it's too sour, add some sugar.
translation into uzbek: Agar juda kislotali bo'lsa, ozroq shakar qo'shing.

example in english: Curry should be spicy!
translation into uzbek: Karriga achchiq bo'lishi kerak!

definition: To move food or a liquid around using a spoon or other object.
example in english: Stir the sauce gently over a low heat.
translation into uzbek: Sousni past olovda ehtiyotkorlik bilan aralashtiring.

definition: To feel pain in your body or mind, or to have a particular illness or physical problem.
example in english: I'm suffering from a cold at the moment.
translation into uzbek: Hozirda sovuqdan azob chekmoqdaman.

definition: To have a particular flavor, to eat or drink something and experience its flavor.
example in english: The dinner was one of the best meals I've ever tasted.
translation into uzbek: Kechki ovqat men tatib ko'rgan eng yaxshi taomlardan biri edi.

definition: The flavor that something creates in your mouth when you eat or drink it.
example in english: I love the taste of chocolate.
translation into uzbek: Men shokolad ta'mini juda yaxshi ko'raman.

definition: The process of providing medical care, or a particular type of medical care.
example in english: What's the best treatment for this disease?
translation into uzbek: Bu kasallik uchun eng yaxshi davolanish nima?

definition: A natural substance in food that is necessary to keep your body healthy.
example in english: Oranges contain lots of vitamin C.
translation into uzbek: Apelsinlar ko'p miqdorda C vitamini o'z ichiga oladi.

example in english: They've found an ancient city at the bottom of the sea.
translation into uzbek: Ular dengiz tubidan qadimiy shaharni topishdi.

definition: Printed or woven in a pattern of squares.
example in english: I got a new red and blue checked shirt.
translation into uzbek: Men yangi qizil va ko'k tekisli ko'ylak oldim.

definition: Cloth made from the white fibers of a plant called a cotton plant.
example in english: Is this shirt made out of cotton?
translation into uzbek: Bu ko'ylak paxtadan tayyorlanganmi?

definition: To make something new exist or happen.
example in english: How do I create a new file?
translation into uzbek: Yangi faylni qanday yarataman?

definition: To decide how something will be made, how it will work, or what it will look like, and often to make drawings of it.
example in english: The bride wore a dress that she'd designed herself.
translation into uzbek: Kelin o'zi dizayn qilgan libosni kiygan edi.

definition: The way that something is made so that it works and looks a certain way, or a drawing that shows what it will look like.
example in english: The car has a new design.
translation into uzbek: Mashinada yangi dizayn mavjud.

example in english: Jessica fixed my watch.
translation into uzbek: Jessika mening soatimi tuzatilgan.

definition: To bend a piece of paper or cloth and press one part of it over another part.
example in english: Fold the paper in half.
translation into uzbek: Qog'ozni yarmiga egib qo'ying.

definition: A public building where you can look at paintings and other works of art.
example in english: We could go to a museum or a gallery this weekend.
translation into uzbek: Biz bu hafta oxirida muzey yoki galereyaga borishimiz mumkin.

definition: The state of being better than before, or the process of making something better than it was before.
example in english: There has been an improvement in relations between the two countries.
translation into uzbek: Ikki mamlakat o'rtasidagi munosabatlarda yaxshilanish bo'ldi.

definition: Loose clothes are large and do not fit your body tightly.
example in english: These jeans are a bit loose, so maybe I need a smaller size.
translation into uzbek: Bu jinsi shimlar biroz keng, ehtimol kichikroq o'lcham kerak bo'lishi mumkin.

definition: To make regular repairs to something, so that it stays in good condition.
example in english: The car had been very well maintained.
translation into uzbek: Mashina juda yaxshi saqlanib kelinayotgan edi.

definition: If one thing matches another, or they match, they form an attractive combination.
example in english: She wore a green dress and a hat to match.
translation into uzbek: U yashil libos va mos keladigan shapka kiygan edi.

definition: Cloth or substance used to make things.
example in english: What sort of material is your desk made from?
translation into uzbek: Sizning stolingiz qaysi materialdan tayyorlangan?

definition: To become conscious of someone or something by seeing, hearing, or feeling them.
example in english: After a few days here, you hardly notice the noise.
translation into uzbek: Bu yerda bir necha kundan so'ng, siz shovqinni deyarli sezmasligingiz mumkin.

definition: A written sign or announcement that gives information or warns people about something.
example in english: They put up a notice on the door saying they'd gone out of business.
translation into uzbek: Ular eshikda biznesni yopishganini bildiruvchi e'lonni osib qo'yishdi.

definition: A set of lines, shapes, or colors that are repeated regularly.
example in english: I like the pattern on your carpet.
translation into uzbek: Men sizning gilamingizdagi naqshni yoqtiraman.

definition: A number of things that are put on top of each other in an untidy way.
example in english: Rubbish lay in piles in the street.
translation into uzbek: Ko'chada axlat to'plangan edi.

definition: Involving, or relating to, real situations rather than theories or ideas alone.
example in english: Practical experience can be as valuable as academic qualifications.
translation into uzbek: Amaliy tajriba akademik malakalarga teng qadrga ega bo'lishi mumkin.

definition: With a surface that is not smooth.
example in english: The walls were built of dark, rough stone.
translation into uzbek: Devorlar qorong'i, qattiq toshdan qurilgan.

example in english: Trace the shape onto the card and cut it out.
translation into uzbek: Shaklni kartonga izlang va kesib oling.

definition: A thin, smooth cloth made from the fibers produced by insects called silkworms.
example in english: I love your new silk shirt.
translation into uzbek: Men sizning yangi ipak ko'ylagingizni yaxshi ko'raman.

definition: The part of a piece of clothing that covers your arm.
example in english: Oh no! I've got a little tear in one of my sleeves.
translation into uzbek: Oh yo'q! Menimcha bir yelkamda kichik yoriq bor.

definition: Completely even with no rough areas.
example in english: How do you keep your skin so smooth?
translation into uzbek: Sizning teringizni qanday qilib silliq saqlaysiz?

definition: To pull something to make it longer or wider, or to become longer or wider.
example in english: Can you stretch the material a little?
translation into uzbek: Materialni biroz cho'zib bera olasizmi?

definition: With a pattern of colored lines.
example in english: There was a blue and white striped tablecloth.
translation into uzbek: Ko'k va oq chiziqli dasturxon bor edi.

definition: The way that something is made or done, typical of a particular group, time, or place.
example in english: I don't like the style of dresses that are out now.
translation into uzbek: Hozirgi liboslarning uslubini yoqtirmayman.

definition: If a style or something you wear suits you, it makes you look good.
example in english: The new hairstyle really suits her.
translation into uzbek: Yangi soch turmagi unga juda mos keladi.
